question: Which of the following is NOT a unit for measuring pressure?
explanation: bar, torr and Pascal are the units used for measuring pressure whereas shake is a unit of time. 1 bar = 10<sup>5</sup> Pa 1 bar = 760 torr 1 bar = 1 atmospheric pressure Shake is the smallest practical unit of time. 1 shake = 10<sup>-8</sup>s
